message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI. 

This paper is about aspect-based sentiment analysis, which is a subfield of natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning. The paper proposes a new subtask under ABSA, named aspect sentiment triplet extraction (ASTE), and introduces a two-stage framework to address this task. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category for this paper is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which covers topics related to NLP and machine learning. Other likely sub-categories include cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks), as these sub-categories also cover topics related to NLP and machine learning.
